title: What is the connection between pain, consciousness, and medical science according to occult investigation?
first_phrase: In the previous text, the author discussed how the ego's fear causes it to resist change, resulting in emotional pain and physical illnesses that modern medicine struggles to explain. The author argues that an occult investigation of subtle forces could reveal the true causes of diseases and enable a more holistic approach to healing. In the last 200 tokens, the author delves into the specifics of this investigation, highlighting the importance of understanding the symmetries between organic structures and natural elements and how this knowledge enables practitioners to balance or dissipate disease-causing agents. The author also touches on the potential harms of modern remedies and how they can cause new illnesses due to unknown causes.
